content:
🙌🏾 Preach, Olayemi. 
Yes. I’m so sick and tired of seeing and hearing this. FOH. I must be a drone that does exactly what a man (who doesn’t even know what he wants) tells me? Fuck, no. “What do you bring to the table?” Bro, I bring the whole table, set it, cooked the meal and polished the silverware. What did you bring? Dick and a headache? Come on, fam.
